Replace.Text: millennium
Millennium Science School
of the millennium
seminar
Even if you don't understand me, I don't care if the world defines me as evil. I'm just taking what I believe is right. (Suzuki Rio)
Omniscience, Truth, Millennium Project

[ICON_Science] Science +15% for all cities. Buildings that require [ICON_Power] power have an additional +4 yield from the [ICON_Power] power supply. [NEWLINE] Holy land construction, [ICON_GreatProphet] Hiring a Great Prophet, [ICON_Religion] Religion cannot be founded.
advanced hacking technology

After researching the "Castle" technology, the maximum number of spies you can have will be increased by +1, and 1 free Spy will appear. [NEWLINE] +1 activity level for all aggressive spy missions. Successful offensive spy missions gain 50% of the [ICON_Science] Science and [ICON_Culture] Culture the target city produces each turn.
Rio: "I am the center of the Millennium Science School - the one who leads the seminars. And the one who wants to solve the 'Millennium Challenges' and follows the stars. ”

Unique District of the Millennium. Substitute campus. [NEWLINE][ICON_GreatScientist] +2 Great Scientist Points, [ICON_GreatEngineer] +2 Great Engineer Points. [ICON_Science] Science adjacency bonus +2 from City Center and Industrial Zone districts.
[ICON_Science] Science +{1_num} from adjacent inner city districts.
[ICON_Science] Science +{1_num} from adjacent Industrial Zone districts.
Clean Energy Laboratory
A terrain improvement facility unique to the Millennium. Can be built by workers, up to 1 per city. [NEWLINE] Provides 8 [ICON_Power] power from renewable energy per turn. [ICON_Science] Science +8.

Yuka "Thank you for your hard work. I'm Yuka Hayase, the accountant of the seminar. You're cold-hearted, you use arithmetic...? Where did you hear that from? (angry)" [NEWLINE] Noah "I'm Noah Ishio, the secretary of the seminar. The world of reason and reason. Hey, would you like to travel with me?"
The seminar invites you to your own city (if you accept, the location of the nearby partner country city will be revealed)
I invited a seminar to my home city.
The seminar proposes a map exchange.
Koyuki: Could it be that this place has a system where noisy people are kicked out!?
Yuka "As calculated, perfect~♪" [NEWLINE] Noah "As recorded, perfect♪" [NEWLINE] (The friendship declaration with the seminar has been established)
Yuka ``Well, if you stare at me like that... it's kind of troublesome...'' [NEWLINE] Noah ``Hmm?
Yuka: "Fufu... I'm ready. I didn't make any mistakes in my calculations today!" I am asking for a declaration of friendship.)
Yuka "As calculated, perfect~♪" [NEWLINE] Noah "As recorded, perfect♪" [NEWLINE] (The friendship declaration with the seminar has been established)
Yuka ``I didn't know the computer was... broken...'' [NEWLINE] Noah ``Thank you for your hard work.
Yuka ``You've got a lot of courage... (Angry)'' [NEWLINE] Noah ``Fufu, angry Yuuka-chan is cute too.'' [NEWLINE]
Yuka: "I can't believe that an educator who should be a role model for the students would go to such a shady shop...!" It's cute, isn't it?" [NEWLINE]
Yuka "Reason and reason are merciless. I will prove victory." [NEWLINE] Noah "Confirmed the appearance of the enemy. Command me." [NEWLINE] (Declaring war on the seminar)
Koyuki “Kurosaki Koyuki has arrived~! Ni・ha・ha・ha!! No one can stop me!” [NEWLINE] (Declaration of war from the seminar)
Yuka ``Mathematics leads to the truth.
Yuka ``Current situation and conditions.
Yuka "It's not over yet!" [NEWLINE] Noah "Fufu, let's attack this time." [NEWLINE] (Refused to make peace with the seminar)
Yuka ``Current situation and conditions.
Yuka ``It's not over yet!'' [NEWLINE] Noah ``Fufu, let's attack this time'' [NEWLINE] (Peace talks refused)
Yuka ``Because the problem design was wrong.'' …” [NEWLINE] (seminar lost)
Yuka ``Because the problem design was wrong.'' …” [NEWLINE] (seminar lost)

allowed to open borders.

Yuka ``There are too many variables...'' [NEWLINE] Noah ``Ugh!
The seminar satisfies the terms of the deal.
Seminar denied the request.
The seminar accepted the request.
I have accepted the request from the seminar.
I declined the request from the seminar.
Fits the agenda of the seminar.
Fits the seminar agenda "Focus on culture" (high cultural ability)
Fits the seminar agenda "Focus on happiness" (high comfort)
Fits the seminar agenda "I love gold" (high gold income)
Fits seminar agenda "heavy industrialist" (high productivity)
Fits seminar agenda "Allied City-States" (not conflicting over City-State suzerainty)

Fits seminar agenda "Standing Army" (military strength is high)

Fits seminar agenda "Protector of city-states" (proactive in protecting city-states)

Fits seminar agenda "air power" (air power is high)
Fits seminar agenda "Protector of city-states" (proactive in protecting city-states)
Fits seminar agenda 'civilized nations' (repelled barbarian encampment)
Fits seminar agenda 'environmentalists' (enthusiastic about nature conservation and building national parks)
Fits seminar agenda 'developerist' (enthusiastic about logging and terrain improvement)
Fits seminar agenda "ideological constitution" (same government)
Fits the agenda of the seminar "Nuke happy" (proactive against the use of nuclear weapons)
Fits seminar agenda "Reverence" (high faith)
Fits seminar agenda 'explorer' (low map perfection)
Fits the seminar agenda "paranoia" (lack of military power and desire for territorial expansion)
It went against the agenda of the seminar.

Contrary to the seminar agenda "I love gold" (low gold income)

Contrary to the seminar agenda "Technologists" (low science)
Contrary to seminar agenda "standing army" (military strength is low)
Contrary to the seminar's agenda "paranoia" (military power and desire for territorial expansion are high)

Contrary to seminar agenda "Protector of city-states" (does not protect city-states)

Contrary to seminar agenda "Protector of city-states" (does not protect city-states)

Contrary to the agenda of the seminar "Nuke happy" (reluctant to nuclear attack)

The seminar has promised you to stop colonizing near the border.
Seminar ignores the warning and intends to continue colonization activities near the border.
The seminar promised you not to take military action.
The seminar ignores warnings and waits for an opportunity for military action.
The seminar promised you not to send spies.
Seminar ignores the warning and plans to continue spying.
The seminar promised you not to loot the treasure.
Seminar ignores the warning and intends to continue looting artifacts in the future.
The seminar promised you to stop proselytizing.
Seminar ignores the warning and intends to continue his missionary work.
The seminar asks you to make the following commitments: Do not settle near borders
I made an appointment with the seminar.
I refused my promise.

I made an appointment with the seminar.

I refused my promise.

The seminar calls for the continuation of the alliance.
Yuka ``It's a reasonable choice.'' [NEWLINE] Noah ``It's a rational choice.'' [NEWLINE] (Accepted to continue the alliance with Seminar)
Refused to continue alliance with Seminar.
Yuka ``It's a rational choice.'' [NEWLINE] Noah ``It's a rational choice.'' [NEWLINE] (Continuation of the alliance has been accepted.)
The continuation of the alliance was refused.
Appropriate to the seminar agenda "gossip" (proactive in declaring friendship, opening borders, dispatching envoys, establishing embassies)
Contrary to the agenda of the seminar "gossip" (reluctance to declare friendship, open borders, send envoys, establish an embassy)
Fulfilled the seminar agenda "Follow" (meaning a golden age)
Contrary to seminar agenda 'following' (falling into the dark ages)
Fits the seminar agenda "Humanist" (falls into the dark ages)
Contrary to seminar agenda 'Humanist' (meaning a golden age)
Fits seminar agenda "expansionist" (territory is big)
Contrary to the seminar's agenda "expansionist" (small territory)
Appropriate for seminar agenda 'planetarian' (negative space race)
Contrary to the agenda of the seminar "Flat Earthist" (active in the space race)
Fits seminar agenda "Great White Fleet" (Navy is strong)
Against the agenda of the seminar "Great White Fleet" (weak navy)
Fits seminar agenda "demagogue" (low diplomatic support)
Contrary to the seminar agenda "demagogue" (high diplomatic support)
Appropriate for the agenda of the seminar “tourism-oriented country” (low tourism power)
Contrary to the agenda of the seminar "Tourism nation" (high tourism power)
Fits seminar agenda "religious intolerance" (same religion)
Contrary to seminar agenda "religious intolerance" (different religion)
Fits the seminar agenda "libertarian" (fewer diplomatic victory points)
Contrary to the seminar agenda "libertarian" (more diplomatic victory points)
Fits seminar agenda "looters" (lots of looted tiles)
Contrary to seminar agenda 'looters' (less looted tiles)
Fits the seminar agenda "Bear Enclosure" (not conquering another civilization's capital)
Violated the seminar agenda "Bear Enclosure" (conquering another civilization's capital)
fit the seminar's agenda "zealots" (believing in the religion the seminar founded)
Contrary to the Seminary's agenda "zealots" (not following the religion Seminar founded)
Fits seminar agenda "miser" (high gold income)
Violated the seminar agenda "Miserable" (less gold income)
